__e: Phillip and I were talking, and we think it could be good.
Did you see that movie? Saying, "Who am I?" Phillip and I used to make so much fun of it.
That Phillip and Robert don't even need us. They just want to use the equipment.
You think it might be Phillip Bauer?
If you really want to make me feel better, then go find Phillip Bauer.
And you think Phillip Bauer is somebody that we can trust?
